books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: The fourth book in the Atlee Pine series. Atlee discovers her twin sister survived an abduction at the age of 6.
books.name: MERCY

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: The second book in the Whistler series. Investigator Lacy Stoltz goes after a serial killer and closes in on a sitting judge.
books.name: THE JUDGE'S LIST

books.author: by Michael Connelly
books.description: A death on New Year’s Eve, an unsolved murder and a hunt for serial rapists bring Bosch and Ballard back together.
books.name: THE DARK HOURS

books.author: by Mitch Albom
books.description: After a ship explodes, 10 people struggling to survive pull a man who claims to be the Lord out of the sea.
books.name: THE STRANGER IN THE LIFEBOAT

books.author: by Amor Towles
books.description: Two friends who escaped from a juvenile work farm take Emmett Watson on an unexpected journey to New York City in 1954.
books.name: THE LINCOLN HIGHWAY

books.author: by Dirk Cussler
books.description: Dirk Pitt’s latest adventure involves a missing Buddhist artifact, a failed hypersonic missile and a hijacked ship.
books.name: CLIVE CUSSLER'S THE DEVIL'S SEA

books.author: by Marc Cameron
books.description: The 21st book in the Jack Ryan series. A shadowy billionaire plans to kidnap the first lady to get President Jack Ryan out of his way.
books.name: TOM CLANCY: CHAIN OF COMMAND

books.author: by Nicholas Sparks
books.description: Maggie Dawes, a renowned travel photographer, struggles with a medical diagnosis over Christmas.
books.name: THE WISH

books.author: by Lee Child and Andrew Child
books.description: The 26th book in the Jack Reacher series. Reacher helps an F.B.I. agent look for her missing brother and takes on a foe named Dendoncker.
books.name: BETTER OFF DEAD

books.author: by Colleen Hoover
books.description: A battered wife raised in a violent home attempts to halt the cycle of abuse.
books.name: IT ENDS WITH US

books.author: by Neal Stephenson
books.description: A billionaire restaurant chain magnate’s plan to reverse global warming may create even bigger problems.
books.name: TERMINATION SHOCK

books.author: by Janet Evanovich
books.description: The 28th book in the Stephanie Plum series. Diesel and Stephanie track the international computer hacker Oswald Wednesday.
books.name: GAME ON

books.author: by Ken Follett
books.description: Tensions escalate around the globe as President Pauline Green works to prevent a world war.
books.name: NEVER

books.author: by Taylor Jenkins Reid
books.description: A movie icon recounts stories of her loves and career to a struggling magazine writer.
books.name: THE SEVEN HUSBANDS OF EVELYN HUGO

books.author: by Jayne Castle
books.description: The 15th book in the Harmony series. Gabriel Jones is sent to rescue Lucy Bell but finds she’s not the woman she once was.
books.name: GUILD BOSS
